title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 35 - Child Witnesses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 35 - Child Witnesses

State Regulations
§ 35.1 - Development of methods to reduce trauma to child witnesses
§ 35.2 - Training and education programs concerning treatment of child witnesses

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 35

Statutory authority: Constitution, art. VI, § 28[c]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
